checkExtensions() checkExtensionsConfig ConfigcheckExtensions
static checkExtensions ( $list = null )[static]
Check for needed extensions
Depuis
9.2 Method signature and return has changed
Paramètres
null | array$list
Extensions list (from plugins)
Renvoie
array [ 'error' => integer 2: missing extension, 1: missing optionnal extension, 0: OK, 'good' => [ext => message], 'missing' => [ext => message], 'may' => [ext => message] ]
